hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Amr bin Al-As said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'The difference between our fasting and the fasting of the people of the Book, is eating Sahur

chapter.ara-name: باب فَصْلِ مَا بَيْنَ صِيَامِنَا وَصِيَامِ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ
chapter.eng-name: The Difference Between our fasting and the Fasting of the people of the Book
